meanings: a nation, a country, a state

examples.korean: The ceremony was transmitted live by satellite to over fifty countries. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 의식은 50여 개 국에 위성으로 생방송되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Eating bean sprout broth when sick has been transmitted in family lore as a cure for colds. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 감기의 치료제로서 아플 때 콩나물 국을 먹는 것이 집안 내 민간요법으로 전해져 왔다. 절대어휘 5100
